column2: 13. What is the meaning of blue traffic signs?

column2: 14. When a stop is required at an intersection with no stop line or crosswalk:
column4: Drivers should stop only at a place where the driver can see at least 100 feet on either side.
column6: Drivers are not required to stop.

column2: 21. A steady yellow light at an intersection means:
